tosdr.tldr: Quote: "And should you ever cancel Planio, you can always export your data so that you can work with Redmine on your own server without being dependent on us. While we would be sorry to see you go, we realize that freedom of information is ultimately the standard by which the Open Source philosophy adheres."
tosdr.case: Features of the website are made available under a free software license

title: Features of the website are made available under a free software license
quoteText: hould you ever cancel Planio, you can always export your data so that you can work with Redmine on your own server without being dependent on us. While we would be sorry to see you go, we realize that freedom of information is ultimately the standard by which the Open Source philosophy adheres.
